vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
Pie.Get (patch_8.sol#8-13) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- Owner.transfer(this.balance) (patch_8.sol#10)
	- msg.sender.transfer(this.balance) (patch_8.sol#11)
